name: The Lost Serpent
description: The Lost Serpent is an adventurous 2d game with one goal.  You must find your way home.  To do that you must go forward.  Playing as a snake, you must jump over insane obstacles, moving platforms, and attack or avoid dangerous enemies.  Swim through dangerous tunnels and slay the evil. Once you find the legendary laser, they don't stand a chance, unless they are a massive crocodile.  In three epic environments, travel through the Forest, the Oceanside, and the Dungeon to find your way home.
